title: Nice priorities SJW Rito
body: Interesting that trolls, feeders and braindeads roam free, while average competitive players get banned for calling people idiots. Pathetic.

replies.body: Peole who are in the Pro scene has more of an impact on the game, the company and to the media, and is easy to track or bring down. Idiots who trolls and feeds roam around because they are not only unknown but also not regarded a "threat"
(Riot don't actually care about anyone that is diamond+ unless a LCS/equivalent actually complain)
I didn't mean pros. I just meant people of a competitive nature.
